TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Soap12FaultBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.SoapFaultBinding
Public NotInheritable Class Soap12FaultBinding Inherits SoapFaultBinding

Docs.summary: Represents a service description format extension applied to an when an XML Web service supports the SOAP protocol version 1.2. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class specifies the contents of any error message, which is contained within a SOAP fault.
For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
